MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Lanrigg Avenue and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00am to safely carry out repairs to an underground mains fault at Lanrigg Avenue substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:03am on Wednesday, 10 March 2021
